segments.text: Happy Halloween ! What creature are you going to dress up as ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will dress up as a vampire with big fangs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I have a look at your costume ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Wait a moment . ( Several minutes later ) Here you are .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like your black clothes and your fangs are cool .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will bite many beautiful girls on the neck tonight . Maybe I will suck their blood .
segments.speaker: S1
